Day 1.Description: Rashtraay's street plays (Nukkad Natak) are a reflection of society's deficits, challenging conventions. Their work provokes and encourages one to think, leaving a long-lasting impact.

The competition celebrates poetry, encouraging participants to showcase their creativity and captivate audiences. It aims to inspire self-expression while recognizing and rewarding outstanding talent.
The event will feature external artists, offering students and the college community a chance to engage with professional artwork and deepen their appreciation for the arts.
Rahgir, a band that has been making waves in the music industry, will perform live, showcasing their talent and captivating the audience with their soulful music.

Day 2.Description: A thrilling treasure hunt game designed to test participants' problem-solving skills, teamwork, and quick thinking. Teams will decode clues, navigate through challenges, and race against time to discover hidden treasures. The event aims to foster camaraderie and strategic thinkingamong participants while ensuring a fun and engaging experience.

A Gwalior city-level speech competition inviting students to articulate their vision for Viksit Bharat @2047. Participants will deliver impactful speeches, emphasizing the role of youth in building a progressive and developed Bharat.

This expert talk cum field visit is in collaboration with the solar industry where participants typically tour facilities such as solar panel manufacturing plants, solar farms, or research centers, while the expert provides deeper insights into topics like technology, industry trends, challenges, and career opportunities.

An AI exhibition showcases the latest advancements and applications of artificial intelligence. It typically features interactive displays, demonstrations, and presentations that explore various aspects of AI, from machine learning and computer vision to natural language processing and robotics. These exhibitions offer a glimpse into the potential of AI to transform industries and our daily lives.

Trivia tournament: participants will go through multiple rounds testing their range of knowledge, oratory skills, and presence of mind. A fun and engaging contest where individuals or teams answer questions. It tests knowledge of recent and past  phenomena, from the biggest blockbusters to viral memes.

Open Podcast - Podcast in front of a live audience with guests in fields of AI, entrepreneurship, and content creation. This will also be recorded and produced for everyone to see via an online medium.

Get ready to find your rhythm and dance like no one's watching because it's about to be a crazy night filled with enthusiasm and an electrifying vibe where a vibrant atmosphere is set, offering a chance to let loose, enjoy music, and connect with others who share a passion for rhythm and dance.
